resources.string:
Flashing a ROM can manipulate the Batterstats.bin file.
This file is used by the phone to map the battery charging.
If this file is corrupted the phone my stops to charge/use the battery correctly and so the file has to be recreated.
This app will remove the old Batterystats.bin file and let the ROM create a new one.
This will fix most common software issues.
This cannot however fix any hardware related issues.
